column5: Passing this on as I get emails from them,and thought those that dont,it would be helpful.  At Sail  REG. PRICE: 1349.991099.99

GREAT!!!! I have no money!!! Cabin material purchases add up pretty fast here. â€‹And even worse are those unplanned expenses. My espresso machine broke yesterday and I had to fork out over $1200 for a new one.
Me either but,thanks for posting,One day maybe?,little more work needed first would work,than who knows. .lol.

I got that email to. It still qualifieds for the $200.00 mail in rebate as well which makes this a pretty sweet deal!  I am also one of those with no funds for such a purchase but if I could, it would be awesome
With the rebate it is a screaming deal.  I just can't justify it having upgraded just last year.
I wish it was the 9 on sale. That's a great deal though.
*sigh*  Time to sell a kidney.  And a lung because I want an HDS 12 at my console the 7 can go on the bow!!!
where are they on sale ??? brian we need location,location,location....haha
where are they on sale ??? brian we need location,location,location....haha I believe he said Sail.
I thought my eyes were bad. LMAO

Out of curiosity....Does anyone know if the plugs for power and transducer are the same as The HDS5 Gen2??  I would hate to have to fish all new wires in my boat..  I'll be going to look at this today...
Anyone heard of any problems with the touch screen?  Pretty sweet deal with the rebate.  Does one really need a kidney?  Down to one since the divorce.

Out of curiosity....Does anyone know if the plugs for power and transducer are the same as The HDS5 Gen2??  I would hate to have to fish all new wires in my boat..  I'll be going to look at this today... Standard Lowrance Blue plug.  Your cables from your HDS5 will hook right up.....

Anyone heard of any problems with the touch screen?  Pretty sweet deal with the rebate.  Does one really need a kidney?  Down to one since the divorce. They work really well actually except for when I installed an aftermarket screen saver.....not good at all.  This is my second year with my HDS9 touch and they do get a bit slimy sometimes with fishy hands.  You just need to clean them carefully to prevent scratching but so far so good.
